TopicTitle: Silly, I know... But where do I find this "The Advanced Grabbing Unit"?

Articles.Content:
As the title says.

Is it under control, structural, propulsion!?

I've been looking and looking all over for this "The Claw" but I can't find it. Help please!

Edited April 3, 2014 by karolus10
Tag change
Under utilities, looks like a white tube with a round top.

Allright, thank you.

It is missing over here so guess I'll try to reinstal.

Did you transfer a career game from .23?

Check the tech tree for not yet unlocked parts in the nodes maybe.

It's in a separate node that wasn't there before. With a 0.23 save you'll probably need to fork out 170 research points to open it up. ;-)

Greets,

Jan

Figured out the problem.

Was using an unupdated tech tree mod.
Could anyone tell me where the part files for the grabber are? I can't see anything obvious, and would like to know how to add it to a modified tech tree.

Could anyone tell me where the part files for the grabber are? I can't see anything obvious, and would like to know how to add it to a modified tech tree.

They are in the NASA folder in gamedata.

Could anyone tell me where the part files for the grabber are? I can't see anything obvious, and would like to know how to add it to a modified tech tree.

There is a separate NASA directory with all the parts in the KSP/Gamedata directory.

Ninjahhhhhh

I was about to smash my computer to pieces, but you sir, have saved one computer from the junkyard.

There is a separate NASA directory with all the parts in the KSP/Gamedata directory.
